body: Trees and Shrubs        Bristlecone Pine Taken on Spectra Point Trail       Bristlecone Pine (Pinus longaeva) Douglas-Fir (Pseudotsuga menziesii) Englemann Spruce (Picea engelmanii) Limber Pine (Pinus flexilis) Subalpine Fir (Abies lasiocarpa)
title: Cedar Breaks National Monument: Trees and Shrubs
